# AVVideoCodecKey

**Global Variable**

A key to access the name of the codec for compressing video.

## Declaration

```swift
let AVVideoCodecKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString], equivalent to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMVideoCodecType]. Use this key to set the video compression format to H.264, HEVC, or JPEG, depending on the video codec types available in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureMovieFileOutput]. Check available video codec types by consulting [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureMovieFileOutput/availableVideoCodecTypes].

## Video codecs

- **AVVideoCodecType**: A set of constants that describe the codecs the system supports for video capture.
